titleStmt.title: SII 7.853: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 853. (A.R. No. 226 of 1902). IN THE SAME PLACE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . kopparakecaripanmarāṉa tribhuvaṉacakravarttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟku
yāṇṭu 3vatu siṁhanāyaṟṟu Irupatteḻān tiyatiyāṉa putaṉkiḻamai peṟṟa Aśuvatināḷ kiṭaṅ
kilāṉa rājentracoḻanallūr Ūrom Ivvūrp piḷḷaiyār supramaṇyayadevarpaṇṭārattu śrīvikkiramaco
ḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu paṉṉiraṇṭāvatu Uṟtecattu nāṅkaḷ taṉiccu koṇṭa kācu muppatu Ikkācu muppatu
kkum Iṉṉāḷvaraiyum policaiyāl vanta poruḷaṟakkuṭuttu mutal kaṭavomāy niṉṟa kācu
muppatukkum Ittevaṟku nāṅkaḷ viṟṟukkuṭukkiṟa nirṉilamāvatu Eṅkaḷūrt teṉpiṭākai ciṟukiḷina
llūril kokuṭicceṟuvukku mitaṉ kiḻai Eḻuvarkāḷikkum kiḻpāṟkellai piṭāripaṭṭikkum piṭāriyār ko
yilukkum meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai tiruvakatticuramuṭaiyār tevatāṉam kuḻicceṟuvukkum Āḻvār tevartāṉam cakkara
ppaṭṭicceṟuvukku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai kokuṭicceṟuvukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai kiḻakkunokkip poṉa ka
ṇṇāṟṟukkut teṟkum Iṉṉāṟ perellaiuḷḷu makappaṭṭa nilattiṟ kiḻakkaṭaiyap paṉṉiraṭikkolāl kuḻi Āyiramum
Ippaḻaṅkācu muppatukkum viṟṟukkuṭuttom kiṭaṅkilāṉa rājentracoḻanallūr Ūrom Ivarkaḷ colla Eḻutiṉeṉ Ūṟkaṇakku Āti
Digital edition of SII 7.853 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
